title: Shadow of the Ghost: Book 1: Lord of Chaos Trilogy
description: Chaos reigns as warring gods engulf an entire planet in their conflict in Shadow of the Ghost, an epic fantasy that places the fate of creation in the precarious hands of Ky, an unpredictable elven child. Their planet is a place where the inhabitants are suffocated by unbridled power that must be checked. Rachk'sha believes that all creation is his to manipulate as he wishes. With no remorse, he imprisons his brother, an old man, and begins to replace the gods, The Nine and the Council of Darkness, as if it were a game. The planet on the verge of war, Maker decides to send Ky, a "Seed," to set things right. Ky has his work cut out for him. Denied his coming of age and exiled in a cruel world, Ky must first deal with haunting memories and an insatiable need for revenge before he can seek meaningful justice.
author: Tanner Artesz
